verses.verse: And SHimshon <S%H8123><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Timnath <S%H8553><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> in Timnath <S%H8553><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And he came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> in Timnath <S%H8553><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: now therefore get <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> her for me to wife <S%H802><s%>.

Then his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Is there never <S%H369><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> among the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, or among all my people <S%H5971><s%>, that thou goest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> Philistines <S%H6430><s%>? And SHimshon <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Get <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> her for me; for she pleaseht me well <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H5869><s%>.

But his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that it was of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that he sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> an occasion <S%H8385><s%> against the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: for at that time <S%H6256><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had dominion <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Then went <S%H3381><s%> SHimshon <S%H8123><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%>, to Timnath <S%H8553><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> of Timnath <S%H8553><s%>: and, behold, a young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H738><s%> roared <S%H7580><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came mightily <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon him, and he rent <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him as he would have rent <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8763><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%>, and he had nothing <S%H3972><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: but he told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%> what he had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And he went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and talked <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with the woman <S%H802><s%>; and she pleased <S%H3474><s%> SHimshon <S%H8123><s%> well <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5869><s%>.

And after a time <S%H3117><s%> he returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> her, and he turned aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the carcase <S%H4658><s%> of the lion <S%H738><s%>: and, behold, there was a swarm <S%H5712><s%> of bees <S%H1682><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%> in the carcase <S%H1472><s%> of the lion <S%H738><s%>.

And he took <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof in his hands <S%H3709><s%>, and went on <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> eating <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and came <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to his father <S%H1><s%> and mother <S%H517><s%>, and he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and they did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: but he told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not them that he had taken <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the honey <S%H1706><s%> out of the carcase <S%H1472><s%> of the lion <S%H738><s%>.

So his father <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>: and SHimshon <S%H8123><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there a feast <S%H4960><s%>; for so used the young men <S%H970><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And it came to pass, when they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him, that they brought <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> companions <S%H4828><s%> to be with him.

And SHimshon <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I will now put forth <S%H2330><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a riddle <S%H2420><s%> unto you: if ye can certainly <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it me within the seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H4960><s%>, and find it out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, then I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you thirty <S%H7970><s%> sheets <S%H5466><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> change <S%H2487><s%> of garments <S%H899><s%>:

But if ye cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it me, then shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me thirty <S%H7970><s%> sheets <S%H5466><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> change <S%H2487><s%> of garments <S%H899><s%>. And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Put forth <S%H2330><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy riddle <S%H2420><s%>, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Out of the eater <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> meat <S%H3978><s%>, and out of the strong <S%H5794><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> sweetness <S%H4966><s%>. And they could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not in three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> expound <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the riddle <S%H2420><s%>.

And it came to pass on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto SHimshon's <S%H8123><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, Entice <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy husband <S%H376><s%>, that he may declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto us the riddle <S%H2420><s%>, lest we burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee and thy father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: have ye called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us to take that we have <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%>? is it not so ?

And SHimshon's <S%H8123><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thou dost but hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, and lovest <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me not: thou hast put forth <S%H2330><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a riddle <S%H2420><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, and hast not told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it me. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Behold, I have not told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it my father <S%H1><s%> nor my mother <S%H517><s%>, and shall I tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it thee?

And she wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before him the seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, while their feast <S%H4960><s%> lasted <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and it came to pass on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that he told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> her, because she lay sore <S%H6693><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon him: and she told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the riddle <S%H2420><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of her people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> before the sun <S%H2775><s%> went down <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What is sweeter <S%H4966><s%> than honey <S%H1706><s%>? and what is stronger <S%H5794><s%> than a lion <S%H738><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, If <S%H3884><s%> ye had not plowed <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with my heifer <S%H5697><s%>, ye had not found out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my riddle <S%H2420><s%>.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon him, and he went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Ashkelon <S%H831><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of them, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their spoil <S%H2488><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> change <S%H2487><s%> of garments unto them which expounded <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the riddle <S%H2420><s%>. And his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and he went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to his father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.
But SHimshon's <S%H8123><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> was given to his companion <S%H4828><s%>, whom he had used as his friend <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.
